metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare's mission is to help build a better Internet. We believe a better Internet can be not only a force for good, but an engine of global sustainability.

relatedBlades.title: Impact Week 2021
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare's mission is to help build a better Internet. We believe a better Internet can be not only a force for good, but an engine of global sustainability.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Cloudflare TV: Welcome to Impact Week
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare TV: Welcome to Impact Week
resourceList.description: Join Matthew Prince (CEO & Co-Founder, Cloudflare) and Patrick Day (Senior Policy Counsel, Cloudflare) for an Impact Week fireside chat.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Welcome - Sunday - Welcome to Cloudflare Impact Week
resourceList.resourceTitle: Welcome to Cloudflare Impact Week
resourceList.description: This week we kick off Cloudflare's first Impact Week. We originally conceived the idea of the week as a way to highlight some of the things we were doing as a company around our environmental, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Sustainable Investing with Franklin Templeton
resourceList.resourceTitle: Sustainable Investing with Franklin Templeton
resourceList.description: Join Thomas Seifert, CFO of Cloudflare, and Jonathan Curtis, SVP/Portfolio Manager/ Research Analyst of Franklin Templeton, as they discuss how environmental and social factors impact capital allocation decisions at a leading institutional investor.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Project Pangea: Helping underserved communities expand access to the Internet for free
resourceList.resourceTitle: Project Pangea: Helping underserved communities expand access to the Internet for free
resourceList.description: In this Cloudflare TV segment, we will discuss how community networks operate, challenges they face and how Cloudflare's project offering can help these communities to have a faster, more reliable, and secure Internet.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Announcing Project Pangea: Helping Underserved Communities Expand Access to the Internet For Free
resourceList.resourceTitle: Announcing Project Pangea: Helping Underserved Communities Expand Access to the Internet For Free
resourceList.description: Cloudflare is excited to announce Project Pangea. We're launching a program that provides secure, performant, reliable access to the Internet for community networks that support underserved communities, and we're doing it for free because we want to help build an Internet for everyone.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Pangea Press Release
resourceList.resourceTitle: Pangea Press Release

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Understanding Where the Internet Isn't Good Enough Yet
resourceList.resourceTitle: Understanding Where the Internet Isn't Good Enough Yet
resourceList.description: This week, Cloudflare is announcing Project Pangea, with the goal of helping reduce Internet access inequality.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Why I joined Cloudflare and Why I'm excited about Project Pangea
resourceList.resourceTitle: Why I joined Cloudflare and Why I'm excited about Project Pangea
resourceList.description: If you are well-prepared to take up the challenge, you will get to experience a moment where you are stepping forward to help build a better world. I felt exactly that when I joined Cloudflare as a Systems Engineer in Austin, Texas.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Monday, 2021-07-26 - Introducing Flarability, Cloudflare's Accessibility Employee Resource Group
resourceList.resourceTitle: Introducing Flarability, Cloudflare's Accessibility Employee Resource Group
resourceList.description: I'm pleased to introduce myself and Cloudflare's newest Employee Resource Group (ERG), Flarability. The 31st anniversary of the signing of the Americans with Disabilities Act is an ideal time to raise the subject of accessibility at Cloudflare and around the world.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Designing Cloud Servers for Energy Efficient Performance
resourceList.resourceTitle: Designing Cloud Servers for Energy Efficient Performance
resourceList.description: In this segment, Atiq Bajwa (Ampere) and Nitin Rao (Cloudflare) will discuss how CPUs can be designed to consume less energy.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday - Impact Week Fireside Chat: Chris Bergey, SVP/GM of Infrastructure at Arm and Nitin Rao, SVP of Global Infrastructure at Cloudflare
resourceList.resourceTitle: Impact Week Fireside Chat: Chris Bergey, SVP/GM of Infrastructure at Arm and Nitin Rao, SVP of Global Infrastructure at Cloudflare
resourceList.description: Cloudflare announced improvements in performance per watt using Arm servers. In this CloudflareTV segment, Chris Bergey (Arm) and Nitin Rao (Cloudflare) will discuss the opportunity to help build a greener Internet.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Cloudflare's Climate Commitments
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare's Climate Commitments
resourceList.description: In this segment, Patrick Day (Senior Policy Counsel, Cloudflare) & Michael Aylward (Edge Partner Program Manager, Cloudflare) will discuss Cloudflare's recently announced climate commitments regarding renewable energy and carbon emissions mitigation.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Recruiting Corner: Diversity & Inclusion Hiring
resourceList.resourceTitle: Recruiting Corner: Diversity & Inclusion Hiring
resourceList.description: Tune in to learn more about how we approach and embed diversity and inclusion in our hiring. Every company approaches this differently, and we would like to share what's unique about Cloudflare and how we build a community here that is intentional about D&I.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - The Impact of Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: Fireside Chat
resourceList.resourceTitle: The Impact of Diversity, Equity & Inclusion: Fireside Chat
resourceList.description: Petra Arts, Senior European Policy Manager, and Cloudflare Board member Dr. Katrin Suder will discuss why companies should prioritise diverse representation within their Board compositions as well as the importance of Diversity, Equity & Inclusion in Board considerations.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday - Cloudflare is Helping Build a Greener Internet - Helping our Customers Meet their Sustainability Goals
resourceList.resourceTitle: Helping our Customers Meet their Sustainability Goals
resourceList.description: Join members of Cloudflare's Product team to learn about some new tools we've introduced to help customers measure, understand, and improve their carbon emissions, including our Carbon Impact Report and Green Compute on Cloudflare Workers.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Green Hosting with Cloudflare Pages
resourceList.resourceTitle: Green Hosting with Cloudflare Pages
resourceList.description: Cloudflare is proud to announce its collaboration with the Green Web Foundation, a not-for-profit organization with the mission of creating an Internet that one day will run on entirely renewable energy.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Understand and reduce your carbon impact with Cloudflare
resourceList.resourceTitle: Understand and reduce your carbon impact with Cloudflare
resourceList.description: As part of Cloudflare's Impact Week, we're excited to announce a new tool: Your Carbon Impact Report, available today for all Cloudflare accounts, will outline the carbon savings of operating your Internet properties on Cloudflare's network.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Cloudflare: 100% Renewable & Zeroing Out Emissions Back to Day 1
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare: 100% Renewable & Zeroing Out Emissions Back to Day 1
resourceList.description: By 2025 Cloudflare aims to remove all greenhouse gases emitted as the result of powering our network, and we are committed to powering our network with 100% renewable energy.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Helping build a green Internet
resourceList.resourceTitle: Helping build a green Internet
resourceList.description: While we didn't set out to reduce the environmental impact of the Internet, Cloudflare has always had efficiency at its core. It comes from our ongoing fight with an old nemesis: the speed of light.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Announcing Green Compute on Cloudflare Workers
resourceList.resourceTitle: Announcing Green Compute on Cloudflare Workers
resourceList.description: At Cloudflare, our goal is to bring sustainable computing to you without the need for any additional time, work, or complexity.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Tuesday  - Designing Edge Servers with Arm CPUs to Deliver 57% More Performance Per Watt
resourceList.resourceTitle: Designing Edge Servers with Arm CPUs to Deliver 57% More Performance Per Watt
resourceList.description: Using Arm, Cloudflare can now securely process over ten times as many Internet requests for every watt of power consumed than we did for servers designed in 2013.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Wednesday - 2021-07-28 - Impact Week: A conversation with Janet Van Huysse and Lisa Gelobter, CEO & Founder of tEQuitable
resourceList.resourceTitle: Impact Week: A conversation with Janet Van Huysse and Lisa Gelobter, CEO & Founder of tEQuitable
resourceList.description: "Janet Van Huysse, Head of People at Cloudflare, interviews Lisa Gelobter, CEO and founder of tEQuitable. tEQuitable is an independent, confidential platform that addresses issues of bias, discrimination and harassment in the workplace.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Wednesday - 2021-07-28 - Crawler Hints: How Cloudflare Is Reducing The Environmental Impact Of Web Searches
resourceList.resourceTitle: Crawler Hints: How Cloudflare Is Reducing The Environmental Impact Of Web Searches
resourceList.description: Crawler Hints provide high quality data to search engine crawlers on when content has been changed on sites using Cloudflare, allowing them to precisely time their crawling, avoid wasteful crawls, and generally reduce resource consumption of customer origins.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Wednesday - 2021-07-28 - Introducing Smart Edge Revalidation
resourceList.resourceTitle: Introducing Smart Edge Revalidation
resourceList.description: When both Last-Modified and Etag headers are absent from the origin response, Smart Edge Revalidation will use the time the object was cached on Cloudflare as the Last-Modified header value. When Cloudflare receives a revalidation request, our edge can respond using the generated header.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Wednesday - 2021-07-28 - Global Internet Access and the Fourth Industrial Revolution
resourceList.resourceTitle: Global Internet Access and the Fourth Industrial Revolution
resourceList.description: The World Economic Forum has been focused for years on practical solutions for brining the power of the Internet to those who still don't have sufficient access. And they want to make sure that access empowers their lives.  During this session, you'll hear from Daniel Dobrygowski of WEF about opportunities for the next steps in this effort.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Wednesday - 2021-07-28 - L&D Roundtable: Development Opportunities at Cloudflare
resourceList.resourceTitle: L&D Roundtable: Development Opportunities at Cloudflare
resourceList.description: The Learning & Development team empowers employees to do their best and help build an empathetic and inclusive community. Join our roundtable discussion to learn more about the tools and resources, course offerings, community engagement strategies, and diversity, equity, and inclusion goals.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Cloudflare's Human Rights Commitments
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare's Human Rights Commitments
resourceList.description: Today, we are releasing our first human rights policy. The policy sets out our commitments and the way we implement them. Cloudflare's mission — to help build a better Internet — reflects a long-standing belief that we can help make the Internet better for everyone.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Certifying our Commitment to Your Right to Information Privacy
resourceList.resourceTitle: Certifying our Commitment to Your Right to Information Privacy
resourceList.description: Cloudflare recognizes privacy in personal data as a fundamental human right and has taken a number of steps, including certifying to international standards, to demonstrate our commitment to privacy.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Project Galileo and the Global Cyber Alliance
resourceList.resourceTitle: Project Galileo and the Global Cyber Alliance
resourceList.description: Listen to a discussion about how the Global Cyber Alliance and Project Galileo are working to provide the tools and resources for journalists in order to be safer online.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Impact Week: How Cloudflare Is Reducing The Environmental Impact Of Web Searches
resourceList.resourceTitle: Impact Week: How Cloudflare Is Reducing The Environmental Impact Of Web Searches
resourceList.description: Alex Krivit (Product Manager, Cloudflare), Matthew Prince (CEO & Co-Founder, Cloudflare), and Rustam Lalkaka (Director of Product, Cloudflare) will discuss a new company initiative that aims to reduce the technical and environmental costs associated with redundant website crawls.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Project Galileo and The Global Cyber Alliance Cybersecurity Toolkit for Journalists
resourceList.resourceTitle: Project Galileo and The Global Cyber Alliance Cybersecurity Toolkit for Journalists
resourceList.description: Independent media and journalists are targeted both physically and online as a result of reporting critical events around the world. Learn how the Global Cyber Alliance and Project Galileo are working to provide the tools and resources for journalists in order to be safer online.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Cloudflare Partnership with Defending Digital Campaigns
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare Partnership with Defending Digital Campaigns
resourceList.description: In this segment, we will discuss the challenges political campaigns face online, ongoing efforts of DDC to provide resources to these groups and expanding these protections to state parties in the United States.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Working with those who protect human rights around the world
resourceList.resourceTitle: Working with those who protect human rights around the world
resourceList.description: Today, we are announcing Radar Alerts, a new program to help our civil society partners track and document Internet shutdowns and protect democratic elections around the world from cyberattacks.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Expanding Cloudflare's Protection of Elections Globally: Partnership with The International Foundation for Electoral Systems
resourceList.resourceTitle: Expanding Cloudflare's Protection of Elections Globally: Partnership with The International Foundation for Electoral Systems
resourceList.description: Join Jocelyn Woolbright, Program Manager at Cloudflare, as she interviews Stephen Boyce, Senior Global Advisor, Election Technology and Cybersecurity at the IFES to discuss how the organization works to develop and provide assistance and support for elections in new and emerging democracies.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Cloudflare's Athenian Project Expands Internationally
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare's Athenian Project Expands Internationally
resourceList.description: Due to the growing trend of cyberattacks targeting election infrastructure, election security is not a US-specific issue. Today, we are extending our security tools to a range of election entities around the world.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Impact Week Fireside Chat: Maria Eitel & Patrick Day
resourceList.resourceTitle: Impact Week Fireside Chat: Maria Eitel & Patrick Day
resourceList.description: Join Maria Eitel (Founder of the NIKE Foundation and Founder & Chair Emeritus of the Girl Effect) & Patrick Day (Senior Policy Counsel, Cloudflare) for an Impact Week fireside chat where they will be discussing corporate responsibility; ESG.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Cloudflare and COVID-19: Project Fair Shot Update
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare and COVID-19: Project Fair Shot Update
resourceList.description: Cloudflare Waiting Room helping organizations around the world to stifle COVID-19 and aid with easy rapid vaccinations.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Thursday - 2021-07-29 - Helping Secure Elections Around the World with IRI, NDI and the D4D coalition
resourceList.resourceTitle: Helping Secure Elections Around the World with IRI, NDI and the D4D coalition
resourceList.description: Election security and the integrity of foundational democratic institutions has been a growing concern. Learn about online threats to a range of players in the election space and how Cloudflare is working with NDI, IRI and the D4D coalition to strengthen democratic institutions and increase civic participation.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Friday - 2021-07-30 - Cloudflare is joining Pledge 1%
resourceList.resourceTitle: Cloudflare is joining Pledge 1%
resourceList.description: We're excited to announce that Cloudflare is joining Pledge 1%. We're joining the more than 12,000 companies in 100 countries that are committed to making a tangible, positive impact in their communities.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Friday - 2021-07-30 - Why I Joined Cloudflare & Why I'm Excited About Project Pangea
resourceList.resourceTitle: Why I Joined Cloudflare & Why I'm Excited About Project Pangea
resourceList.description: Cloudflare is a clear destination for leading technologists in the Industry. Tune in to learn more about Roderick Fanou's journey to Cloudflare and his excitement about Project Pangea, which helps improve security and connectivity for community networks at no cost.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Friday - 2021-07-30 - Introducing Greencloud
resourceList.resourceTitle: Introducing Greencloud
resourceList.description: Greencloud is a coalition of Cloudflare employees who are passionate about the environment. Join us for this session to learn about Greencloud's history, mission, and progress so far.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Friday - 2021-07-30 - The Future of Work
resourceList.resourceTitle: The Future of Work
resourceList.description: Join Matthew Prince (CEO & Co-Founder, Cloudflare) and Janet Van Huysse (Head of People, Cloudflare) for this special Impact Week fireside chat.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Friday - 2021-07-30 - Building a sustainable workforce, through communities
resourceList.resourceTitle: Building a sustainable workforce, through communities
resourceList.description: At Cloudflare, we place a lot of value on the importance of diversity, equity and inclusion. Diversity, equity, and inclusion lead to better outcomes through improved decision-making, more innovative teams, stronger financial returns and simply a better place to work for everyone.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Friday - 2021-07-30 - How Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) can change an organization
resourceList.resourceTitle: How Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) can change an organization
resourceList.description: Employee resource groups (ERGs) foster community and a sense of belonging, help drive organizational change, and improve the overall quality of an organization's culture. Most importantly, they help organizations become more diverse, equitable, and inclusive.

resourceList.title: Impact Week 2021 - Friday - 2021-07-30 - Introducing Greencloud
resourceList.resourceTitle: Introducing Greencloud
resourceList.description: Greencloud is a coalition of Cloudflare employees who are passionate about the environment. Initially founded in 2019, we're a cross-functional, global team with a few areas of focus: Awareness, Support, and Advocacy.
